Skills.skills_massage: Confident in working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks—especially React—allowing me to build dynamic and visually engaging user interfaces.
Skills.skills_info: Experienced in developing responsive, cross-browser websites with a strong focus on user experience, clean design, and fast loading times.

Portfolio.portfolio_info: Through my portfolio, you can explore a collection of functional, responsive, and visually appealing websites that reflect my skills and creativity. Each project is crafted with a deep understanding of user needs and client goals, combining modern design trends with cutting-edge technologies.

Blog.blog-infoTitle: Get Started With VO IT lessons.
Blog.blog-info: I got into web programming when I started studying in the 11th grade of school and mastered the basic skills of this field at the VO IT Academy.
Blog.blog-information: At the end of 2024, I joined the team of the 'Najot Ta'lim' training center to learn more about the field.
